basics.name: Dinellys Gutierrez
basics.label: Human Resources Professional | Psychologist
basics.summary: Something I have learned through the years is: You can always teach someone how to do things, but you cannot force them to have a good attitude towards them. This is something I'm really good at: I can teach people and I can lead teams and get them to do a great job with outstanding attitude. Being a Psychologist with more than 10 years of experience in Human resources processes and BPO has given me with the knowledge in several processes in this area: employee retention strategies, organisational communication, disciplinary processes, social responsibility, massive hiring and legal background. All this time being exposed to the industry has provided me with strong leadership skills promoting team personal and professional growth and keeping high quality standards in performance. I really think this would be valuable in organisations now a days, we not only work with processes but with people who in turn (and ultimately) deliver results for companies and make them competitive in the market, so, this is what I would bring to the table: To make you better, to make us The Best! Outside work I love to spend time working on my personal development, taking self awareness courses, focusing in work with emotions and how to identify themâ€¦ my spare time is pretty much like yours for sure: going to the movies, music, walks with my pet, time with my family and having "Friends" on repeat on Netflix.

highlights: Leading of the processes concerning the Human Resources area
Creation and monitoring of control strategies for staff turnover
Creation of strategies for volunteering and social awareness.
Creation of staff retention strategies
Management of Human Resources local team
Creation and delivery of reports of HR area
Follow up on the goals and indicators of the Human Resources department
Participation in the internal and external selection processes
Support in the resolution of internal conflicts
Follow-up to disciplinary processes and terminations
Development of communication strategies
Analyze attrition data and work closely with HR Manager in action plan creation towards attrition reduction goals
Support and execute employee retention action plans
Disciplinary processes support
Coordination of hiring and social benefits
Payroll support
Audit social security enrollment for all staff
Support and create HR reports for different metrics
Support conflict management resolution among employees in operative positions
Management of local employee data base
Perform training in: soft skills, customer service and sales strategies
Update incoming waves of employees in client processes and systems
Deliver reports on training metrics
Monitoring performance of trained employees within the first 3 months of production
Development and implementation of action plans to increase performance of trained employees within the first 30 days of production
Support service delivery team in retraining, performance evaluation processes for trained employees within the first 6 months of hitting production floor
Perform external selection processes for different areas of the company according to requirements and needs (Sales, Accounting, Upper Management and Tech)
Application of performance evaluations.
Organization of activities to support Well-being
Home visits for retired employees
Interviews and psychological tests to retired personnel and their family members
Onboarding for incoming employees at all levels (Management, Admin, operative and interns)

education.studyType: Psicóloga - Minor Psicología Económica y del Consumidor
Cursos Psicología Vocacional, Psicología Social, Psicología del Desarrollo
